Milwaukee Tool

ONE-KEY™

Platform: Web, iOS, Android, Desktop

The Challenge

Create a cross-platform application that utilizes Bluetooth technology to communicate with tools.

Activities

User Research, Personas, Journey Maps, Design Sessions, Wireframes, Mockups, Prototyping, Usability Testing, Front-End Development

Date: February 2014 – January 2016
Client: Milwaukee Tool

Patina Solutions

The Mentor Bank

Platform: Responsive Web

The Challenge

Create a site for mentors and mentees to establish a connection based on experience and common interests.

Activities

User Research, User Interviews, Personas, Journey Maps, Design Sessions, Wireframes, Mockups, Prototyping, Usability Testing, Front-End Development

Date: July 2016 – January 2017
Client: Patina Solutions

FedEx

The Challenge

Internal Application Discovery

The Challenge

Grainger

Foodliner Mexico

Product Warehousing

Platform: Web

The Challenge

User Research, Personas, Journey Maps, Design Sessions, Wireframes, Mockups, Usability Testing
